name: Easy Mediterranean Fish
author: mleiland
summary: This fish is so easy and really flavorful. If you like spicy, try sprinkling a little bit of cayenne pepper as well as the seasoning on the fish before pour the mixture over it. One of the household favorites!
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place halibut fillets on a large sheet of aluminum foil and season with Greek seasoning
Combine tomato, onion, olives, capers, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a bowl
Spoon tomato mixture over the halibut
Carefully seal all the edges of the foil to create a large packet
Place the packet on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until the fish flakes easily with a fork, 30 to 40 minutes
